attributes.action: tell us now when he is going to leave...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is over 60 million people living in the United Kingdom and all represented by our MP'S But the man at the top is Tony Blair. If the public are telling there MP'S our feelings why does he not lisen to us. So if you think Tony should give us a date please sign and while Tony is going round the United Kingdom, why not tie a scarf around the lamp post in front of your house just to show him that you do not agree with what he is doing and it is time to move on and give the public a date.I THINK WE SHOULD BE TOLD

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
